extension.summary: Collection-aware TV & movie browser with linked movies, tag filtering, and shared collections
extension.description:
Replaces the standard library browser with a collection-aware TV and movie browser. Group related TV shows and movies into collections, manage linked movies across franchise boundaries, and sync your setup across multiple Kodi installs via MySQL.
Features: - TV Collections: combine related shows into one item in the title listing. - Movie Collections: group related movies, or import existing Kodi movie sets via Migrate Movie Sets in addon settings. - Linked Movies: movies linked to a TV show appear alongside its seasons and episodes. Move them between the show listing and collection level via context menu. - Shared Collections: sync collection config across Kodi installs using the same MySQL server. Enable in addon settings. - Tag Filtering: browse TV shows and movies by library tag. Root menu includes dedicated tag folders. - Flatten Seasons: respects Kodi's "Flatten TV show seasons" setting, skipping single-season shows straight to episodes. - Select First Unwatched: respects Kodi's "Select first unwatched TV show season/episode" setting. - Include Specials: respects Kodi's "Include All Seasons and Specials" setting. - Forced Views: sets skin forced views for seasons, episodes, TV shows, and movies on first run.
All collections are managed entirely through context menus. Use as a replacement for library://video/ in skin widgets and shortcuts.
